response.overview: A coot and a ferry skipper peacefully coexist along a city river. Their harmony is disrupted when a new bridge emerges, causing the skipper to lose all his passengers overnight.  Fortunately, the bird, typically engrossed in nest-building, unexpectedly becomes the link that revitalizes the ferryâ€™s purpose.  Marlies encapsulated the essence of community unity within a vibrant two-minute animation.
response.title: coot
